course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Issues in Chinese History from Han to Tang
course.description: By critically examining key historical events, institutional changes and major cultural figures in the Chinese history from the Han to the Tang dynasties, this course aims to clarify many myths and misunderstandings of history which had long been adopted by orthodox historiography, and to keep students informed of new developments in historiographical theories, viewpoints and ideas, as well as exciting archeological excavations.
